categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Padawan served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic in the decade marked by the Separatist Crisis and the Clone Wars.

A Force-sensitive was trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order during the decade marked by the Separatist Crisis and the Clone Wars. During an encounter with the Dark Jedi Garth Ezzar, the Padawan was slain, one of three Jedi meet their end on Ezzar's blade.
